price: 118. Мре bosôló bomonanaki тре lokuta ebungaki тре екотакі pamba тропа maye bazalaki kosala.
arabic: فَوَقَعَ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَبَطَلَ مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: fawaqaʿa al-ḥaqu wabaṭala mā kānū yaʿmalūna
